project.title: Laundry/Tailoring Service Application
project.overview: This project plan organizes the development of a user-focused application for laundry and tailoring services based on provided User Stories.

createAccount.description: As a user, I want to sign up so that I can create and track my orders.
acceptance_criteria: User can sign up with name, email, phone, address

loginSignin.description: As a user, I want to log in so that I can access my dashboard.

createOrder.description: As a user, I want to create a new order so that my laundry or tailoring request can be processed.
acceptance_criteria: Order is saved and appears in dashboard

orderStatus.description: As a user, I want to see my order status in real-time so that I know when it will be ready.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows current status of all orders

tasks.name: Design and implement user signup form
Set up database schema for user data
Implement backend API for user signup
dependencies: Set up database schema for user data

tasks.name: Implement authentication API (email/password)
dependencies: Set up database schema for user data

tasks.name: Design and implement order creation form
Set up database schema for orders
Implement backend API for order creation
dependencies: Set up database schema for orders

tasks.name: Implement real-time order status updates
dependencies: Implement backend API for order creation
